issue.title: [CI] C++/Java/Rust workflows should trigger on changes to Flight.proto
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8309](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8309). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Flight DoExchange format change caused Rust build failures (ARROW-8308). We would have caught these in the format change patch, but the Rust builds weren't triggered on changes to `format/Flight.proto`.
